Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse Pixel

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.Pixel
public class Pixel extends Object
The `Pixel` class represents a pixel with a color and an index.

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      This function returns the color.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method `getColor()` is returning a `Color` object.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      This function sets the color of this pixel.
      Parameter:
      color - The color value to set.

    • getPosition

      public Vector2D getPosition()
      The function returns the position of an object as a Vector2D.
      Gibt zurück:
      A Vector2D object representing the position.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Vector2D position)
      This function sets the position of an object to a given 2D vector.
      Parameter:
      position - position is a parameter of type Vector2D which represents the new position that we want to set for the pixel.
